y22LVnZGY7b114HPHk30BA.text: A MUST!! Been here for brunch, lunch just as good! Morgan, our waiter was super friendly & his suggestions where spot on!! Tuna tartar guac was amazing!!!! My favorite was the burrata. Order the Trade Secret cocktail!!!!! Wish I had another one right now Thanks Morgan

o1u1OzUg5cRifeUXZDJvcQ.text: Came in with a friend of mine and sat at the bar. We waited to even get a greeting then decided to time the bartenders to see how long it would take them. Five extra minutes and the place wasn't busy. Unfortunate. Menu looked decent. Won't be back to give it a second try. First impressions are everything.

QE-T-mjXQKfU4VlawdHufA.text: Had a great dinner here with some girlfriends!  Came here on a quiet Thursday, Kardi was especially fun and accommodating.  Great personality and so fun!  Service was great!  Loved the Tuna tartare and the rock shrimp.  Rock Shrimp was probably our favorite.  Lobster roll was great too!  They offer both hot and cold and the flavor was delicious! Sit on side patio if you can the ambience there is wonderful!

5am48_gQGTcmvwBIKWknSQ.text: TERRIBLE. SERVICE. AVOID. AT. ALL. COSTS. NOT WORTH IT. Good food and good drinks but absolutely terrible service. I was there on a Sunday night which meant the restaurant was very empty and slow, it still took 15-20 minutes just to get a drink delivered. The food took about half an hour it took 20 more minutes from the time we requested our check to when we actually got it.

miokBcWH93Ie86CJH_KrlQ.text: Service was horrid waited around ten minutes never brought even water .. the name would imply seafood ... there is barely any ..limited to lobster roll and some fish tacos ...

18hK10xtBf6JAUYCt72_Yg.text: Great Sunday brunch!! Went with a group of girls for a final meal of a stagette weekend! Mimosa special was amazing....a bottle of bubbles and your choice of 3 juices! It's like having your own Mimosa bar at the table!  Reservation worked out really well as there was a line-up at the door (thank goodness we made a reso)  Interior is super cute and there is a great vibe! Live music was awesome!! Drinks and cocktails were great! Lobster rolls are good, but not the best Ive had.  Probably better to go with more "breakfast" options such as the crepes or breakfast sandwiches.  Atmosphere is worth it :)

azJB5PUot2bUDnKcz9UIcw.text: I tried Montauk and this restaurant the food really disappointed. I do like the ambience there and of course the beverages though.

jDeDitqcvihuQ2hZfjNJcw.text: My husband and I rarely go out to eat as we enjoy the kitchen together but we decided to step out into the Scottsdale area and simply ran into this place.  We were so hungry and expressed that immediately after being seated.  It was around 4pm and there were only 7 other people in the entire place.    We ordered the fish n chips and it was the greasiest I've ever experienced.  Not to mention it took almost 45 minutes to get the food (again, NO ONE around) and the fried food was cold? Wait, what? Yes, not to mention the fries and fish were cooked in the same grease that had to be at least a week old. Gross!    I left most of the meal on the plate with no offer if something was wrong.  Our server (receipt says Gaddy Lauren) had to have been on something because it was the slowest service during a time when no one was there.  Did I mention the place was filthy?   That was a HUGE $50 mistake. Save yourself and go anywhere else.

OR0AuoEISCxVTx8GdKwAJw.text: Great food and huge servings. Was a little disappointed that such a nice place didn't serve cappuccinos or espresso of any kind, but otherwise everything was good. Beautiful interior and patio space in the front and back! Service was also good - no complaints!

N4ZkFmHgrRxKKDYOklET-Q.text: The ambience is great, the food is good and arrives quickly, but the service needs improvement. I booked a table for a friends birthday and asked for a patio table. It  was ready when I got there, but I sat without anyone coming over for 10 minutes. There were servers attending to the other tables on the patio, but none of them gave my table so much as a glance. When I found a manager and asked for service, he said he would have someone come right over. Nope. When I finally got up and asked one of the servers if this was her table she said "it could be". She did an overall good job BUT questioned the tip when we paid!

UK6PQbIz5Iu-hGdVALsUaQ.text: Just did our graduation lunch here and Gabby took great care of us and had perfect service! Morgan was also the manager and was very attentive and helped us greatly!

fCTpHCN8y52GYDHcHsueqA.text: Gabbie and Morgan were awesome, they made my friends graduation super fun! We received top service from Gabbie and Morgan gave us free shots for the celebration. I love coming to this place.

ZgCI0lbI651W94_5cK34uA.text: Montauk is awesome! The service was awesome, Michael my server was super cool. John behind the bar, drilled our drinks. Always on time; if you have a drink schedule. Management uses their position properly, made me feel like I was the only customer in Scottsdale. Did I mention the food, thanks BoH!

Y8FGc4yHxSfcRra6WLDdJQ.text: Went here on a Sunday around noon.  It was SO LOUD we could barely hear the waitress. We shared the New England Clam Chowder for appetizer and it was a great choice.  Best I've had in years. We ordered a Cesar salad to split but they brought the entree first, so we cancelled it.  For the main course we each ordered a hot lobster roll and it came with potato chips. It was tasty but we ended up reordering the cesar salad because we were still hungry.  I think they should offer 2 sides with the lobster roll to satisfy appetites and make it worth the $20 they charged for it.  That said, I would go back for the clam chowder.

z-BUrjx5IMMS-8pM6AnwUQ.text: I have always had great food and a great dining experience! It's a fun atmosphere and dog friendly. Our server Chloe was very attentive and friendly! Would definitely recommend!

SrNqY1oqmlxo9HcDSGpbpw.text: Love this place and the location. Really good food and service. Would recommend to anyone who likes to be social.

OCEeRPzfydngZXQN_xhAZg.text: I was there on May 11th for lunch after flying into Phoenix. My salad was so-so. I had the avocado and pink grapefruit with shrimp.  The shrimp tasted like they were grilled hours ago. And the greens was just a dense blob of greens with not much flavor.   The salad was a large serving but I quickly lost interest. My daughter's tacos were good.

pzCRqAEYN8kVkPWiiv9xkg.text: This place has a great atmosphere because it's owned by nightclub guys. However the food is really average.  Super hot girls working there though and decent $5 drinks for happy hour.  The $18 lobster roll was a joke. Maybe 2 tablespoons of chopped up lobster.  The cauliflower rice was actually decent but the chicken on top was flavorless and tasted boiled.  Come for the drinks and atmosphere.

I1bzpvxuFt8HEmAxeoZ8rQ.text: Great brunch spot for casual drinks and light eats, not so great for dinner, the theme simply doesn't compliment it. I otherwise love their kale salad w/chicken, their cold lobster roll, cauliflower rice w/egg and their lemongrass ceviche! And make sure to start your drinks with a Sparkplug (for my coffee lovers out there).

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Kale salad w/chicken
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ribeye Tacos

xyg2_q06VaGO2edIYRDP6g.text: Maddy is the best! Best spot in old town mainly because of the the dedicated employees The Montauk has like Maddy. She's always attentive and right on time when I need anything. Keep hiring people like Maddy and I'll keep coming back!

MHic6DC4Sv-KEb6XJzdtbw.text: I ordered delivery service, it was fast and the driver was very nice, I ordered clam chowder and a prime rib sandwich, the sandwich was hot and tasty, unfortunately they forgot the clam chowder and the fries were a little cold, however when I called, ....and this is why they get 4 stars, they were very nice and didn't try tell me I was wrong. Michael was very adamant on wanting to make sure my order was done right, he delivered as promised, the only thing stopping me from a 5 star rating is they forgot the clam chowder when I first ordered, but I will order again, food was good and service was even better, thx you guys for not making it difficult!!! Good job

V4a6kJZrySlUJxrjJ1IDjQ.text: Came here one Saturday for brunch, ordered Clam Chowder, salty as hell, drank so much water and still have salty taste after paying the check, will not order that item again.  Ordered House Burger, just typical burger, just fancier on a nicer looking plate.  It's a great place to people watch and to hang out with friends, and that's about it.

vIqt_TcPviBjHj3g00dEkA.text: Brunch on NY Day...a treat with enticing cocktails, salads, sandwiches and egg dishes.  We had perfect Bloody Marys, chicken crepe and burger.  Exceptional service and relaxing live music.

OcCv1as0DNPjDPZ78NCbFQ.text: Great atmosphere. Service sucks.  Try getting a drink at the bar... it's a joke.   No one seems to care either.  So many other options in this town, and I've given this place way too many chances.  Peace out

b9_FU5kn-3ElFPt3DdrC9w.text: By far the best spot I've been to in quite some time. Has the best happy hour in town. Try the deep dish pepperoni pizza. It's seriously the best pizza I've ever had since living in Chicago. When you go, ask for Hartley. He will give you the best service. For drinks be prepared to try every one on the menu and uber home because you just won't be able to stop.

uqYlaZzQUl0iq5kGx5UCtg.text: Great food and service.  Thanks especially to Morgan for making sure we were taken care of!

CamvbQpMzzIZSOis6tn77g.text: Love this place.. Great brunch spots with a nice atmosphere. I highly suggest checking this spot out to see for yourselves.

Bm7oWjm1YHkV79DnqHaJRA.text: Morgan, the manager, recognized my husband and I  from a previous visit, and was our server, a fun guy. I had the Avocado & Punk Grapefruit salad with chicken. It was fresh with a jalapeno dressing giving it a great flavor. My husband had the Grilled Kebabs, herb chicken. He loved the favor.  One of his sides, seasonal veggie, turned out to be Brussels sprouts that were amazing! You must try them!!  Drinks are awesome, especially the Greyhound!

_X_bRU-FRgs7OlXzZqVyMQ.text: Love the Montauk!  Brunch, happy hour, or dinner is always delicious.  It has such a cool, nautical atmosphere -- reminds me of being on Cape Cod!  The bar and patio are super chill and their drinks (and wine list) are great.  A Scottsdale staple!

_DlZLwqHqO0v5QV6aM5aCQ.text: I highly recommend The Montauk... everything from the food, to the atmosphere, to the music, to the management.. TOP NOTCH. Thanks to Dillon for making our experience the best ever. I've been there on several occasions and my favorite time is Sundays for Brunch. Get there early though!

VEDdAl_IiwJmqc5hKOSxKg.text: Tuna tartar and burrata was good. TERRIBLE service!!! And it wasn't even busy for hh on a Monday yet nobody wanted to help. The girls next to us were complaining too that they weren't getting service. Tried to charge me $16 for a kettle dirty martini.... Um excuse me??? It's a wanna be Yacht club with terrible club music. The owner did take off the up charge for the martini which was nice. Won't be returning though! Better places to visit

FLQH07IQVraLH7HW5hlVYw.text: Phenomenal place. Great atmosphere. Fabulous servers. Drinks and food are great, a definite must do if you're in the area for drinks after dinner or brunch

4AMm3FH2wMKjsataZaSKrw.text: Came in with a few friends on Friday. Such a fun lively spot the music was upbeat and the bar was busy. We got a table outside and Christina was our server! She killed it! Made awesome suggestions on drinks and food. The tuna guac is to die for and the cherry whiskey smash is heaven if you live jamoson. Great place to start your weekend off!

7ld0H-0tiu-lqmsZtN3wDg.text: We came here today, July 4th because most places were closed and this place had positive reviews. The fish tacos, deviled eggs, haystack fries were great. Except for the mix up where the Mac N Cheese my wife ordered had meat after she had explained she is a vegetarian and does not eat meet. These mix ups happen but Montauk's manager offered to comp the ENTIRE BILL. We liked the food, drinks, service, and sincere apology that we couldn't really accept that. They cut the bill in half anyways and genuinely apologized again. This kind of response shows that they really want you to enjoy the food and experience. We plan on coming back and making it a regular hang out spot. Thanks guys for the great customer service!

jz_Jb1qnogRvjUefNf3piw.text: Stopped in for brunch today before hitting up spring training. We sat at the bar outside for a few drinks. The blonde with the glasses was awesome. She recommended the grapefruit cocktail and it was perfect. The food did take a little while, but it was worth the wait. Had the lobster roll this time, and I'm looking forward to trying everything else next time.

4zj7IvQLqYfTyoAa3oVKug.text: The food was wonderful, the atmosphere not so much. We were seated at a couch and end tables for dinner and the music was so loud I couldn't hear the person sitting next to me. But... the food was great! I tried the shrimp rice bowl and it was delicious.

vdeh-lTYWltxy-n_41qKRw.text: Super friendly waitress and amazing watermelon mules!  Nice atmosphere sitting out back!!

LHYtHWcP8tefN0zQ2dCIyg.text: The service was horrible, the wait for food was over an hour and a half. We were sat with no silverware and had to get our own. I asked the hostess to send our server over 3 times. The restaurant was empty and the food took forever still. We ordered food vegetarian and came out with bacon mixed in. The drinks even took 20-30 minutes to get. Horrible. Don't go when there's so many better places in town.

BBDGo5B7YkrixEeC9OhhCA.text: Typical bar food. I asked for a well done burger and it came out medium, server took off the price of the burger. Also had the deviled eggs which were nothing special. Person I was with ordered  the Mac and cheese and it tasted like a cheap Velveeta mix. The cocktails are typical Scottsdale pricing but are very good mixes. Overall, the environment was cool, the food was not great, and the cocktails are good. I would come here again with friends for the environment and cocktails but nothing else.

-7hS08DtyrJL4T-RFcbB2g.text: Make that four stars five!  In my previous review I said that I would have given it a five if the music hand been turned down a couple of notches.  Yesterday it was, and the food was every bit as good.  Somebody in the kitchen really pays attention.  It's very hard to avoid over cooking corn if your attention slips for even a minute.  Yet this place nails it every time.

iBDQ-s1h_rdsMglK3IREUA.text: I cannot believe this place isn't rated higher- I have been here twice in the past week.  The first time I was there was Halloween night and we stopped in for a drink and discovered it was Wine Wednesday- they have all bottles of wine for half price and they're already affordable.  So that's a must to check out.  Then I went there for brunch on Sunday and my mind was blown- I ordered their chicken Crepe with the kale salad (no dairy) and it was one of the best things I have eaten in a LONG time.  The crepe was bigger and much more filling than I would have expected and that kale salad is going to be a 'go-to' item when i'm there.  I would highly recommend and I will go back.  We'll see if I try something new or if I'll stick with my crepe.

t-Gf1VJ2sXpoIHLZDwa4Bg.text: TL;DR: Service was fine.  Food was great!  This was my second time to Montauk.  I sat at the bar and had some appetizers with friends.  The bartender took our order relatively quickly, but seemed to busy to make time to get to know the 4 of us.  (Not a bad thing, we were all talking to each other anyhow)!  We all shared the house made potato chips, deviled eggs, and French fries.  All were pretty good, but the French fries in buffalo sauce was AMAZING. I most definitely recommend that.  The potato chips with house made ranch were good but after having the flavorful fries, they seemed, well, bland.

iqWX50AjT21tgcCEFIrClg.text: Very mediocre. I always say this place looks from the outside like it should be better than it is. Menu is kinda blah. Vibe is so so.

be1jKx9LBffW-pGHIvHVOg.text: We have eaten here before when we were in town and the food was good and the service was ok. But when we went here with friends on Memorial Day the wait we were told was 30-45 mins while we waited I counted 15 tables that were empty and that had been cleaned and set up for guests but the wait list showed 9 parties waiting. We were finally seated after about 40 mins. We ordered cold appetizers and they arrived pretty quick. However when we ordered lunch it was 50 mins after our order was put in that or food finally arrived. I went to use the bathroom and they had fallen short here again no paper towels and no hand dryer. I ordered coffee with my meal and never got a refill until we were done with the meal and read to go. They have a really great location here and good atmosphere but their processes Need a Lot if Work!!!

xW1DshdNHsYoS65k7Bfjng.text: Terrific customer service!  Very impressive!  Adorable spot to hang out at and be happy. Everyone seems really happy there. I liked that a lot.

SpYV9oCb-HJUfpeWVfSphw.text: The food and drinks at The Montauk are really good. All experiences have been great here. However, on Saturdays the crowd is unbearable. My guests and I asked how long the wait was and were told 30 minutes at least. However, there were three open tables right in front of us that weren't getting taken. The hostess we had was unfriendly and rudely asked us if we wanted to put our name down. She was very unpleasant and seemed annoyed that we did want to put our name down. When she did seat us, she threw our menus down and walked away without a smile or any words. Thankfully our waitress was very nice and made up for the hostess.

kNfoSY-CDw3cDAhaBV70Ag.text: Short haired blonde bartender moved at the pace of a snail or slower. We came for mimosas and brunch. Food was good but bread was sparse for breakfast and the eggs came out wrong. I assume because she didn't write down our order when she took it. She did the same thing with people next to us. She kept repeating their order over and over again. Not going back.

JZxIrtIbyVN4J4zZmWdQxA.text: This place is great for brunch or even to grab drinks with a friend. The atmosphere reminds me of the Hamptons and it has a great vibe. When i went here for brunch they had a singer live and playing the guitar which made for a nice ambience. The food is decent and then the drinks are great.  Definitely a hip, fun place to go to for brunch.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

_U37YSMdWV5J3CoEeaODRg.text: We just got to town and we were starving. We stumbled upon Montauk and were pleasantly surprised. The bartender was polite and attentive, food was great (I had the lime shrimp bowl) and the restaurant was clean. They have a great set up for larger groups and smaller parties. It was a great experience and I would definitely go back!

HFYN6WQeQI4luelDHR8lUA.text: Nestled in the Cleavage of the Arizona valley, Scottsdale is as crazy as a carnival in Rio, or a derby in Kentucky. Amidst the madness is a little slice of vibe, a place where drinks run wild, people laugh endlessly, and all of old town is a walk away.   Like a Meredith grey, you want service good, quick, and without the drama. In comes Kardi. The original kardi. Meredith af. Shadowed by nick, a great part of The Montauk team. Then it happened. The smiles to change the world. The best service, the nicest staff, like a Meredith grey that just saved the world tonight (Swedish house mafia). And all of a sudden, your old town evening begins.   Go!

5hvS2xl6-y-ejiCYljMZbg.text: My family and I enjoyed dinner and drinks here on a Friday evening. We ordered the potato chips with dip to start which were a great snack to have while we had our drinks. We then tried the fish tacos with kale salad and hamburger. The portions were good and the food tastes great!   The music inside was very loud which made it feel like we were eating in a club and the servers at times took longer than normal to bring things that we requested. But overall it was a pleasant experience and I may come back for drinks and snacks.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Potato chips and dip, so good!
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fish tacos with kale salad!

pNXEfi7gsJszlu_86JlmNQ.text: Awesome restaurant! Love the food and service. The atmosphere is relaxed and fun. The staff is super nice and David, the manager is a really nice guy. We had a blast and look forward to going again.

12xA60lg6BVA6uvPrF-7Iw.text: What a lovely spot in Scottsdale! Had the Tuna Guacamole and warm Lobster Roll! Delicious dinner in a beautiful atmosphere: perfect spot to eat, drink and relax!

qMHZY9fS5p32l88NZM4klQ.text: I've been wanting to try this place out so we came here for lunch on a Sunday. It was about a 20-30 minute wait for a table. We sat outside on their lovely patio listening to the live music that was playing.   I ordered the watermelon mule to start. This was a very refreshing drink, but not very strong.Watermelon, ginger beer and vodka. I then ordered the Rose Sangria. Now this was delicious and definitely hit the spot. I ordered the burrata for my entree. This comes with grilled bread, prosciutto, fig, pistachio, roquette, and truffel oil. Also very delicious.   I really liked this place. I love their outdoor patio and the atmosphere. I just thought that their brunch menu was pretty small and our waitress wasn't very talkative. I'd come back though.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Burrata
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Rose sangria
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Watermelon mule

9_gYfGlKuk2_YA9m8LnEEA.text: Enjoyed brunch with the ladies on a Saturday morning. It was good we got there at 10 because by the time we left it was packed! Tried a little of everything at our table: Lobster roll, Turkey and Egg sandwich and Berry Crepes. I had the high dollar item, hot lobster roll with a kale salad. For $20 I was a little disappointed.  The roll was a standard soft hot dog bun, no toasting or buttering.  The lobster was plentiful but a little rubbery which means its over cooked, but very flavorful with the sauce. I ate it all! the kale salad was heavy on vinegar so I could only eat about 1/2 of that.  The berry crepes looked huge and must have been delicious, the plate was empty.  The turkey & egg sandwich was another plentiful dish with a large side of potatoes & fruit.  I would go for these items before I'd go with the lobster roll next time.

N1rRtKKlUjuYGTTZ-puQaQ.text: This place is five star for the creation of great atmosphere and solid comfort. The service was top notch and everybody is attentive yet very casual. The decor gives the full Nantucket vibe.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

zJPHZKP5yVeXCWDbOM6uLA.text: We came here after dinner at Diego Pops because we had some friend in town and didn't want the night to end so soon. We had some drinks at the bar and saw a table had been empty for at least 10 mins. The basketball had ended so many patrons had left the outside area we were in. We asked the hostess if we could sit there since there were 5 of us (with alcoholic drinks) and due to no one else having a reservation or a line for dinner at the time, we were seated (mind you, it was about 8:30pm). Five minutes later were rudely told to leave by the manager on duty for no reason. Unprofessional and no manners. We will not return.

bhKop6czNuj8ds-BjI4upA.text: Great service great atmosphere, love the design and furniture in this place! My salad was fantastic. Definitely recommend eating here. I also had the potato chips on happy hour they give you a lot for your money!

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Z2eojnBQOTvd_e3-mKCy_g.text: Great local spot in Old Town! Great location, awesome patio, crafty drinks and good food!

zDa9z7NCCWWm0NdeTTg8pQ.text: Can't wait to go back. This place is sophisticated and has amazing small plates. The tuna appetizer is amazing.   Only complaint is the bartending. Order something simple or one of their specials and you'll be fine. Friend had the worst old fashioned.

6hp__hxplndCZrSgFbantQ.text: We met friends from California at Montauk for lunch and everyone loved it.  They loved the atmosphere, we loved the food, what a great find.  My husband is from Long Island, so I've spent a lot of time on the island and The Montauk nailed it!   I highly recommend this Downtown Scottsdale spot for the food and the atmosphere!

h3qoidVOBtbxfk1rrqz63A.text: My goodness. It was delicious! From the burrata to the lobster roll, it was perfection. I was with a 9 month old and they willingly served us. The music wasn't too loud, and it was a great crowd. I can see why people love this restaurant! I strongly recommend the WARM lobster roll. It was the best one I have ever had. This is a perfect place for friends, dates, and family nights. It was awesome!

oOgzIrsu8xIyBRzUyjghTA.text: Always great service and food! Trendy place but wouldn't suggest bringing kids here. If you're planning on having a quiet meal then this place isn't for you. Not saying it's loud, but it IS in Old Town after all and some people are or get rowdy.

BF9y87lYsbPbGlrG1RFDfg.text: I love this place! The cocktails are amazing and the brunch menu is a great bang for your buck.

RBun5MAwPb3S1lUEpq54sg.text: I love The Montauk and have frequented for about a year now and have finally decided to write a review about the place. After having Michael as my server multiple times I figured it's finally time to publicize my appreciation for him and the entire place in general. Every single time I am there he remembers me and takes the upmost care of me and my friends, service is always speedy on his part and he always provides us with great drink/food recommendations. I love seeing him there and will always request his section whenever I come in.

BGiViBha8UOGJBAhpRDdpg.text: The environment and music was great. Great service, very tentative but not overly tentative. Ceaser salad was delicious, the House burger was good but was a little over portioned with the amount of onions, pickles and so forth. Overall the food is 7/10 but the atmosphere is definitely 10/10.

JCPkA3S2LOUAUuvQyNm2UQ.text: This restaurant is AWFUL!!! The service is TERRIBLE!!! My friend had her bachelorette dinner here, and while I could not attend, I tried to buy bottles of alcohol for the table for when they arrived. I emailed the management team and called 4 separate times, just to try to coordinate the purchase. After finally getting through to the management team and after the payment went through, they didn't even deliver the wine. Additionally, I had to hear from my other friends that they never delivered it...NOT EVEN THE RESTAURANT! Horrible horrible service. Would not recommend coming to this restaurant. They clearly cannot handle parties.

vYJv5xKR9j6NfJhFkl2R8w.text: Came here with a friend and she wasn't happy but I'm not hard to to please so I actually liked the place at first. Cool concept, the drinks and the food were good but everyone knows that when you're going out to places like these and spending a bunch of money the service can ruin that very quickly. There first of all was a wait even though the entire outside seating was empty and we told the hostess that we were okay sitting out there. Since the bar was open seating we opted to sit there on the outside side. There were still seats at the end but for some reason they hadn't rolled up the door to give us access to the bartenders but eventually they did and offered us service. Before that I went up to the bar to purchase two drinks and before the bartender handed me my receipt she paused and said hold on and went back to the register. I kind of figured out what happened but she just handed me a new receipt and I tipped and signed it. After checking my online banking my suspicions were correct. She incorrectly charged me the first time and then corrected it and even though she may have reversed the charge, I cannot confirm that because she was not honest enough to tell me about her mistake and what she did to fix it as has happened anytime in my life when a restaurant has accidentally charged me the incorrect amount. So dishonest from a patrons standpoint. Im new to the area and I will not be returning.   I have since spoken to the manager after calling again since I guess the hostess didn't give a manager my info yesterday when I called and couldn't speak to someone so there's that also. He was very kind and apologetic so I upped my review to 2 stars for that but at the end of the day it's about the principle and not money.

83G8QpCYZ7LZJBTjMNRUgg.text: Great patio, especially at night in the fall. I had the prime rib sandwich. It was delicious! The waiter was fantastic. We hard a group of six ladies and he offered to take our picture out front after our dinner which went above and beyond!

P2rPdj06j-qGCjEaReQ3RQ.text: Ever go to a pace that the staff is really friendly and tries real hard but overall the service was slightly below average and the food just there?  Well this is sorta one of those places.    For an appetizer ordered the tuna tartar guacamole.  Decent portion of tuna, guac was relatively fresh but the pita chips served didn't really do much for it.  Did taste the Serrano peppers but just didn't have the flow.  Tried the house made chips.  Where a bit hard for me and one thing I love is homemade fries.  Lastly had  the fish tacos and while there was a generous portion, the taste wasn't really there.  Not bad, not that good.  Waitstaff was friendly and the atmosphere seemed cool.  Will probably be back to try some different menu items and see how they do.

3j463TFFyJZoS0B8a2fJhw.text: Delicious prime rib breakfast sandwich! I highly recommend it. Service is always quick and friendly.

iui0FH1glxzLO-5SAUturw.text: This place looked awesome!!  Ordered to-go.. Epic fried "rice" with lobster. 3 star bc my Togo order forgot salad dressing on what looked to be an epic salad. Thumbs down.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Good looking salad. They forgot to put the dressing in the bag. Too far to go back.

ElAZ7w4sPFiVrAvIvVqCow.text: Gotta love their cocktails ! Always refreshing! And their late night menu it's a plus !!!! It's always so hard to find a place have late night menu in old town area besides fat food .. and I'm def not a fast food person ! My husband and I always come here for date night too!

pgbP0efsPSWTc3ox2g7PQg.text: Breakfast is simply yet Decadent! They have a guy playing guitar and singing who is very talented! Our waitress was also amazing all around a really wonderful place!

auIqYb7E2iOybBVq_0vd6A.text: Absolutely loved it. Got right in and sat down and was able to catch up with an old friend over a Bacon & Egg crepe with mango mimosa for brunch. Lovely atmosphere with live music.

SSqddJiDyi4eVe28NW6Vfg.text: What a fun brunch place. When we got here they told us there was a 20 minute wait but we could get a drink at the bar. Luckily there were 3 seats at the bar so we just sat there!  The bloodys were great, nice and spicy!   I got the chicken egg white crepe and it was huge, I was stuffed after I ate it.   The DJ was playing great music, it was a little loud for my taste though.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chicken crepe! So good, and so filling!

uPO6u_aDbnoBTrbzGQt9Vw.text: What an awesome little gem of a place! Beach vibes, awesome drinks & great location! Morgan was a rockstar server! I highly recommend the Mac & cheese dish, lobster roll or jalapeno chicken sandwich nomz nomz

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

wTUvZjqHjklRtbtC1Ns0Vw.text: I am torn about the Montauk. They introduced to me to my favorite drink (Cherry Whiskey Smash) and have an awesome location. The staff that works there is usually nice. It's as if it does not know what it is. Sometimes it is a lovely cafe/bar (not sure about the quality of the food -- never ate there). Sometimes it is an overly loud and crowded mixed-age party bar. When it gets crowded, it becomes unpleasant (and not just for the obvious reasons... hehe). I leave the final decision to you. It is clean and pretty nice.  P.S. Oh, and before you get the Cherry Whiskey Smash, make sure they have the Luxardo Cherries in stock. Otherwise you pay a silly amount for a glorified mule.

ZuxYz6gIHZgbz02s5v--IQ.text: A friend and I went to Montauk after the majority of tourists were gone.  We went in at 12:15 and had no problem getting a table.  Our server was helpful for me!  I ordered the Poke chopped salad, and I didn't leave a morsel on the plate.  It looked lovely and tasted just right!  So for that I give it a 5 star salad, and I thought it was fairly priced at $13.  My friend however ordered the fish and chips and didn't eat it as she thought the breading was thick, kind of crisp on the outside and soggy on the inside.  She ate the chips!  I give that a 2 or 3 stars, so somehow I give the restaurant 4 stars because it's very inviting, well appointed, and makes you feel comfortable a if you were not in Phoenix!  Perfect weather and even inside, with all the windows and doors open, you felt like you were enjoying the beautiful weather today.  I wouldl go again!  Good server also!

cRKYiHxqKYtJIQq0E9QLNQ.text: Great food and great service! My sever Mitch was fantastic! He recommended the best appetizers and drinks. Highly recommended to anyone trying to have a great time!

JE5Dk7BAgRvrC4cctbQASg.text: I went when it had just opened and really loved the vibe and the food was unique and delish I will be back

bg6YRJ2j48dk_DPpDSyTrg.text: The warm lobster roll was phenomenal & my husband had the prime rib sandwich. Great portions & great service. Liked the relaxed atmosphere and good music. Will return for sure.

hxAq0hX76QOQb_vASGbmyg.text: Service horrid...waiting 25 minutes before a server comes by and then another 15-20 before my drink arrived. Place was not busy so there were no excuses.

xlRQhqhODZTU4lx0g3iCfQ.text: EPIC FAIL. horrible service, food was bland. We arrived and were immediately met with insanely loud club music,  huh? We opted to sit outside to escape the music. We ordered a bloody mary which never came. Lunch took over 30 mins to arrive and when it did they brought  only my husbands food and said my order  was on a second check. What?  so I'm  just sitting there without food. And no silverware to boot! When my food finally came, the macaroni was literally just melted American cheese over pasta noodles. We asked for the check which took 10 minutes, after getting sick of waiting we just put cash on table and left. Horrible service, like really bad. We definitely won't be back.

m83ngUoUlwRXG5KpkEo-6g.text: Really liked the food and the atmosphere. The tuna tartare and guacamole is amazing! The drinks are a little over priced, but yet what do you expect in old town.

7Sak1q3yxMMhcnxGi3MdRQ.text: Food was decent, service was not. No wine list. Might come back next time. Nice cocktail list.

viskIh1j2wq6FmLG1_R5Og.text: First time since RE named.  Great upgrade.  Fish tacos are nice.  Always liked this place before...  Still like it!  Perfect corner for hanging out on a warm afternoon.

mQWGEklcREX19LLusTx4zQ.text: As much as I want to give this place 5 stars I can't. The service is incredibly slow. However if I was just to give a rating on the decor, layout, atmosphere, and food? Undoubtedly 5 stars. Hopefully their management sees the flaw and hires more staff.

B5O-UTGzl5dBMswAOR4kow.text: Great food! Great service from Jordan! I would recommend The Montauk to anyone in Old Town Scottsdale!

XmQGlP8f-SHmapAFEQkcpg.text: Fish tacos were good.  Specialty drinks were soso.  Inside the music was too loud but okay if your sitting outside.

e-L_9jQNdL76uDmRrWMkFA.text: Decor Long Island 80's beachy (wicker). Music was really loud, hard to converse. With that being said, we came for brunch and we were not disappointed. We had two servers due to training, so our trainee was very good at making sure our drinks stayed filled. Hubby had the steak and egg sandwich (he really liked and big enough to share) and I had the lobster roll. I had to try it, it was tasty and $19. It was on a piece of potato bread folded to look like a roll and I got shoestring fries with it (so many I couldn't finish it all). None the less it was tasty. I am excited to go back and try their burrata or and their German chocolate creeps. I like the motif although not sure they were going for that 80's vibe (bar stools, marble bar, and wicker).

2BCZnPT8kMEOrPvOqHdnpw.text: This was our first time here. We came for a birthday and such good vibes. If you come with a group get the punch bowls!  I got the Mac and cheese and it was phenomenal. But truly the best part was our server Margo! She was so great, she gave us excellent recommendations and fun to talk with!

mNDHC4B_GG0Y2UZi5_zvkQ.text: Jess was awesome! She knew exactly what our group would love. Food was great, get the chicken with cauliflower rice!

3urz0KtDMukeFvV0yA6g6A.text: Great atmosphere. Best place in Old Town to grab a patio cocktail, enjoy the weather, & people watch. Super friendly staff, particularly Moriah. Try the whiskey smash or the sucker punch. Burstyn salad/app was perfect. Ty the Gm checked in on us to make sure our experience was perfect... Which it was.

xdQAsMfCUabYxz8msWOIzQ.text: Some of the best cocktails in Arizona. We sat in the cocktail lounge before we went out (9-10pm) and my girlfriend was loving the decor and vibe. Service was prompt and we enjoyed the "trade secret" and the "cherry whiskey smash." I was reluctant to leave but we did and we wished we would've stayed. Next time!

xzeqGU8IzC2qLlgj5TswpA.text: Great drinks, great cauliflower and rice side... But I think they should not try to serve lobster. It has no flavor except for the butter.  I will be back to try other fare.

46QqCzLp4mUxx7dE2Qw26w.text: Such a great spot in old town! Staff, managers, owners all care so much about the venue and you can tell! Definitely one place I hit when I'm in town. Good for brunch and dinner, as well as late night drinks!

eKQ8Z0D4tk-sYf2sziFU-A.text: This place is definitely a great place to eat. Really cool environment but I had a hard time enjoying myself because our server was a mess. Anytime I asked her something she seemed like she had no idea what she was talking about... I really like this place but my last time there was horrible other than that time I always have fun there!

uRi6ctD6QN367XyfOHKuNg.text: Walked in off of the street for dinner and was pleasantly surprised! Great food, super friendly wait staff and excellent happy hour prices. I had New York strip and others tried the lobster bake and lobster roll - all were very good.

KJbE40aPDXo_Ge5jBw5ZVA.text: For a place as aesthetically pleasing as this one, it falls very short. Sat at the bar, ordered a pellegrino and fish tacos.  A disinterested bartender, mediocre to poor food, dirty condiment bottles, $8 for a 16.9 oz sparkling water, and the cultural appropriation of having Biggie playing reminds me why I never venture to Scottsdale.

gDMDVtXDIloZdTEW-ahjhA.text: This is my go to place here in Scottsdale when I want to just hang out and grub.  Brussels sprouts tacos are my favorite and i always get them when I come to the Montauk. They have good share plate items, it's always hard to choose between getting house chips, burrata, mac n cheese, and deviled eggs.

xvBzLhvYZhYsG2B7c6sSqw.text: We came to listen to Lee Perreira, one of my favorite local singers, having never heard of this place. We're now big fans. The place was crazy on Labor Day weekend. There was a long wait and it was really loud but in a good way (think beach party). Morgan and the rest of the staff worked their butts off taking care of everyone. We ate the breakfast burrito, a crepe, sweet corn scramble, and chips and dip. Everything was delicious! I'm looking forward to returning for happy hour and to enjoy the amazing outdoor seating.

JzLe5wDQZcXryclCfSJ5bw.text: I think the last time I was here a few months ago I asked for no peanuts in my food and it ended up being in my food and long story short I got pretty destroyed. I didn't really think to come back again after that food allergy incident. But then again I came back this weekend staying hopeful and I was glad I came back. We ordered fries, fried chicken sliders ( without peanut slaw ), and ribeye rice bowl. All were so delicious. It's definitely a banger

EGiHMZPwTbG4aGiepggYjQ.text: The ambiance here is seriously impressive. We came with a fairly large group, on a Saturday morning for brunch. We were one of many parties, which I think accounted for the lack of attentiveness from wait staff. The brunch selection was fairly extensive, with some traditional New England favorites, like the lobster roll. I would say the food was good, not exceptional, but I think the decor and overall fun atmosphere made up for whatever else was lacking. I would certainly return to try things out again, possibly at a less busy time of day.

WQAk6RbbEM4C6mMHjSlGSA.text: Fantastic brunch spot with a great vibe. Drinks were great but the Lobster Roll wasn't good at all. Definitely would go back but wouldn't order the Lobster roll again.

K0ywHUO0B2pQlv5FWkFi9Q.text: Food service and ambience is exceptional!!  The ambience reminds you of a beach house, beautiful patio over looking old town Scottsdale. Our Waitress Kristina was friendly and helpful. ( vegetarian sub)  I had the Mac & cheese and added broccoli. Yum delicious!!!

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

TEA2wK9EHPmyrRkieogH9Q.text: What a Yahoo for a hostess. Stood at their Please Wait to be Seated for 5 minutes. No one showed up. I ask a gal standing to my left if she works there. She says did you want a table? I said WHAT DID YOU THINK I WAS STANDING HERE FOR? "I thought you were waiting for someone?" Good Gawd the people they hire nowadays. I then asked her if Matty was working tonight. She asks if she was a server. I said I believe she's a bartender. She then tells me to go ask the bartender. Wow.. Just WOW. We left. F that

8Mr0Y71NoY3naOAFKFAvMQ.text: Came here before and had a decent time here with no complaints, but today unfortunately we must've caught our server on a bad day. We had about a 30 minute wait so decided to grab a drink while we wait for a table and Tiffani the bartender was very attentive and helped us grab a drink which was great.  Following, our table was ready and we headed there with our drinks and hummus. Our server (Kardi I think, it was on the receipt) seemed not to care too much for that, as our group assumed that she was thinking we weren't going to buy anything else -- which wasn't the case. As we sat, we requested to have just one menu and then she aggressively took all of the menus and rolled her eyes at us for some reason.   She never came back to our table but her colleague saved the day. Unfortunately, we didn't get her name but she was apologetic about the behavior of her coworker and went out of her way to help us out after we ordered some additional food and drinks. Sidenote* he chipotle chicken sandwich was good as was the hummus.  What topped it off for us was our table was actually under Kardi's area for us we assumed, because she came back to our table finally and asked if it was together or separate. At that point she should've given our table to the other kind waitress. The second server even realized the service was out of line because when we got our bill back to pay out, she said "sorry she was a brat today". An apology was definitely warranted in that situation but not given. The other server should not have had to apologize for her. My 2 star rating is specifically for the service.

rWdbdCCP_l2dxwE84nJtYg.text: In the heart of Old Town Scottsdale, this brunch spot is great for boozy mornings and good food. They have healthy options too. They sometimes have a DJ. I would recommend for a Saturday brunch with friends. The Moscow Mule punch bowl is a must!!

BX1EGpvW8-Z-ftoy-V8g_w.text: The place is pricey, but the drinks and food are of good quality. Being seated at the bar is fun, but even on a not so busy day the bartenders could really care less about the customers. They seemed to be more wrapped up in pushing product than they did about quality service and having a customer oriented experience. If 2 drinks and a tip is going to cost me $30, I would expect a friendly, and semi-talkative staff.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

yAW8b8S4A6xMyn9MyZEPQQ.text: Love the vibe here! And the live music! I have been about 5 times and always had good food and great service!

ExVng0j9knouQMWKyuGVTQ.text: Sunday morning during spring training.  We took a walk in Old Town Scottsdale and found this jewel of a restaurant.  The Bacon and egg creps are delicious.  Service was friendly and efficient.  I will return next year for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Karen eating a delicious Lobster Roll
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon and egg creps

deR2KhX6JqJPuQ3CVvK2NA.text: Slipped in for a late lunch and was happy to find out that the happy hour menu was available. The entire place was empty except for 3 other diners at the bar.  The place has a Hamptons vibe and the restaurant has a great patio for people watching.  We weren't that hungry and decided to order 2 clam chowders and split a burger. Our clam chowders at $4 was a smoking deal and was a nice hearty portion. This chowder was so good, full of clams and goodies that not only did we eat our portion but we ordered two to go. The chowder also came with two nicely sized crackers to break or dip into the chowder.  The only time I've had chowder this good is when I go to Boston or Connecticut for business.  Yeah it was that good.  When our burger came up, we were honestly already full so splitting it was a good idea. The burger was cooked medium well (although we asked for medium) and had a nicely grilled BBQ flavor. The burger also came with fries. The fries were also of a hearty portion and very tasty. They had a great texture on the outside and were soft on the inside.  There was no skimping in portions or taste at this place.  Overall the service was good, the food nicely presented and for just the few items we ordered, we know that we will return.

photos.caption: Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Cheeseburger and fries
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Best clam chowder ever
Photo of The Montauk - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Room with a view

v7j4Hl49ZkeoYM5Oa1xc-Q.text: I loved it. We went for a birthday brunch and it was the perfect spot. The complimentary Rose was awesome, I didn't expect that.  The service was on point and we never needed anything. My godson especially loved the dessert. This spot was perfect for brunch party in Old Town.
